label: 私領
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Literally, private landholding." Used in Heian and Kamakura times to designate the hereditary holding of a prominent local person. These shiryō might then be commended to a central proprietor and come to compose part of a shōen.　[荘園]　[Cf. Mass, 1982]　"
